projects.description: Generates random quotes when button in clicked or at certain time interval.
Paginates list of students, and filters list if value is searched
Checks if form is valid after user populates with information and provides error messages
Uses object-oriented programming for a game where random phrases are displayed by empty boxes. Users can use keyboard to select letters or click on screen keyboard.
Uses public APIs to generate random profiles. Additional inofmation about randomly generated profiles are shown when they are clicked. Profiles can be searched through.
